events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue described by the customer fits the refund category because they received an incorrect product and want their money back.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case and assist the customer promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from support. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let's get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received so I can verify the problem?
My order number is 123456789 and I've attached a photo showing the wrong product. This has been very frustrating.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thanks for handling this so quickly. I appreciate the fast response and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there are any further issues or questions.
Since there has been no response and the refund confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
